snippet.title: ARK: Survival Ascended Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
ARK is reimagined from the ground-up in this next-generation of video game technology with Unreal Engine 5! Form a tribe, tame & breed hundreds of unique dinosaurs and primeval creatures, explore, craft, build, and fight your way to the top of the food-chain. Your new world awaits!

Available today on PC!
PC: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2399830/ARK_Survival_Ascended/

Coming in November to consoles!
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/store/r/9P33VJGVPHVP
Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/concept/10008286

For the latest on everything ARK: Survival Evolved:

Tweet us at https://www.twitter.com/survivetheark
Hang out on Discord at https://discord.gg/playark
Watch us tame on Twitch at https://www.twitch.tv/survivetheark
Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/survivetheark/
Visit the Website: http://playark.com
Community Hub: http://www.survivetheark.com
Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/playark
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/survivetheark
